content: Uhhh wait, is it really possible to pass f32 and f64 in/out of aarch64 asm without having the FPU enabled? I guess because you explicitly direct it to use a "soft float" convention?
Yes, you can pass them in general-purpose registers.
In which case it acts just as if you used to_bits/from_bits.
Jubilee has marked this topic as resolved.
